response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
